definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: Door hinged on the left hand side, one-hand operation, lockable.
sentences.chinese: 門絞鏈在左面，單手操作，有門鎖。

sentences.english: Someone was opening the front door with a latchkey.
sentences.chinese: 有人在用門鎖鑰匙開前門。

sentences.english: Door locks on automobiles and most high-security locks have pin tumblers.
sentences.chinese: 門鎖和汽車最高級的安全鎖有腳酒杯。

sentences.english: High-class cabinet door lock with revolving handle.
Jinfeng Harwatre Manufactory is an enterprise specialized in the production of door lock series products.
sentences.chinese: 金鳳五金廠，是一家專業生產門鎖系列產品企業。

sentences.english: At least, I would not keep my doors barred in the day-time.
sentences.chinese: 至少，我是不會在白天把我的門鎖起來的。

sentences.english: Quickly unfreezes the iced parts of the lock mechanism and recovers their mobility.
sentences.chinese: 快速融化汽車門鎖的冰霜，回覆門鎖靈活性。

sentences.english: Quickly unfreezes the iced parts of the lock mechanism and recovers their mobility.
sentences.chinese: 快速融化汽車門鎖的冰霜，回覆門鎖靈活性。

sentences.english: When she walked near to the door, Lily found the door locked.
sentences.chinese: 當黎黎走近房門時，她發現門鎖着。

sentences.english: Please put the electronic card close to the sensor area of the lock, and then turn the handle to open the door.
sentences.chinese: 請將電子卡靠近門鎖感應區，轉動手柄即可開啓房門。

sentences.english: The boss sailed into me for leaving the office unlocked when I went to lunch.
sentences.chinese: 就因爲我去喫午餐沒把門鎖上，老闆痛罵了我一頓。

sentences.english: Some models have locks or even alarms.
sentences.chinese: 有些裝置還配有門鎖甚至警報器。

sentences.english: If the door lock is loose, it will not serve the purpose.
sentences.chinese: 如果門鎖鬆了，那就鎖不住，沒有用。

sentences.english: When we get there, I stand for a minute, contemplating thelocks.
sentences.chinese: 我們到了那兒，我站了一會兒，凝視着門鎖。

sentences.english: The dog sat on one of the keys and engaged the locks.
sentences.chinese: 狗狗一屁股坐在了車鑰匙上把門鎖了。

definition: to fiddle with/to tamper with/to meddle with/to move randomly/to flail about
car door/door of bus, railway carriage etc
head of a flight of stairs
locked in (with the door locked from the outside)
car window/window of vehicle (bus, train etc)
to close (a door)/to turn off (light, electrical equipment etc)
to extend one's head (out or into)/a probe/detector/search unit
power switch/gas valve/to open the city (or frontier) gate/to open and close/to switch on and off
